revised_title: A Case Study of Large Kidney Stones and their Surgical Removal
tldr: This letter describes a case study of a young man with large kidney stones who passed some through his urethra and others that required surgical intervention. The author, Ralph Thoresby, discusses the size and weight of the stones, as well as the surgical process used to remove them. He also notes the condition of the bladder and ureters after the stones were removed.
